verbs.description: top honors for bravest in s i [V: save] firefighter steven keller of engine company 163 in westerleigh was named firefighter of the year for 1999 by the staten island chamber of commerce keller 37 who lives in new dorp was singled out for heroic efforts in saving fellow firefighter mark knipstein in a burning building in november keller received his award yesterday from fire commissioner thomas von essen at the chamber breakfast honoring the island staten island chamber of commerce commissioner mark knipstein thomas von essen steven keller new dorp engine company
